name: part_003
file: tmp_【THE DEVIL WEARS HOPE 3D LIVE】 IRyS Anniversary LIVE #DevilWearsHope [RQn7biOiqHs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: IRyS addresses the audience, mentioning the upcoming stages and guests before heading to the next area.
Performance of the song 'to the beginning' by IRyS, Tsunomaki Watame, and Mori Calliope.

subtitles.original: ...続けてお願いします。
subtitles.english: ...Please continue.

subtitles.original: えっとね、
subtitles.english: Um...

subtitles.original: この後たくさんの曲をたくさんのステージでね、
subtitles.english: After this, I'll sing many songs on many stages,

subtitles.original: たくさんのゲストと最後まで歌いますんで、みんな最後まで見てね。
subtitles.english: with many guests until the end, so please watch until the end.

subtitles.original: あとね、それどころからもうね、
subtitles.english: And also, even more than that,

subtitles.original: あのとっても素敵なね、
subtitles.english: there's a very wonderful...

subtitles.original: あの告知も最後の方にあるんで、
subtitles.english: announcement towards the end,

subtitles.original: 最後まで見てください！
subtitles.english: so please watch until the end!

subtitles.original: では、Please... Oh, I have to go to the next stage again to sing more songs.
subtitles.english: Well, please... Oh, I have to go to the next stage again to sing more songs.

subtitles.original: では、Be right back! Yeah!
subtitles.english: So, I'll be right back! Yeah!

subtitles.original: Off to the next stage!
subtitles.english: Off to the next stage!

subtitles.original: Estia casa misti fidi adora
subtitles.english: Estia casa misti fidi adora

subtitles.original: to the beginning / Lyrics, Music: 梶浦由記
subtitles.english: to the beginning / Lyrics, Music: Yuki Kajiura

subtitles.original: あと一度だけ 奇跡は起こるだろう
subtitles.english: Just one more time, a miracle will happen, I'm sure

subtitles.original: 優しい声で描く 歪んだ未来
subtitles.english: The distorted future drawn by a gentle voice

subtitles.original: もう誰も泣かない世界のために
subtitles.english: For the sake of a world where no one cries anymore

subtitles.original: 紅く汚された空のどこにも
subtitles.english: Nowhere in the crimson-stained sky

subtitles.original: 届かず消える 叫びと祈り
subtitles.english: Cries and prayers that vanish without reaching

subtitles.original: 慰めさえすべてを裏切る
subtitles.english: Even comfort betrays everything

subtitles.original: きれいな月光の光が 始まりへと沈み行く
subtitles.english: The beautiful moonlight sinks towards the beginning

subtitles.original: その彼方へ 閉ざされて行く瞳で
subtitles.english: Towards that far-off place, with eyes that are closing

subtitles.original: まだ遠くへ手を伸ばす
subtitles.english: Still reaching out into the distance

subtitles.original: 君の嘆きを
subtitles.english: Towards your grief

subtitles.original: 信じて
subtitles.english: Believe in it

subtitles.original: 本当は誰か 救いたくて
subtitles.english: Wishing in truth to save someone

subtitles.original: 迷う心が空に穴を穿つ
subtitles.english: This wandering heart bores a hole into the sky

subtitles.original: 君を選んで二人で行く
subtitles.english: Choosing you, the two of us go on

subtitles.original: 喜びを探しながら
subtitles.english: While searching for joy

subtitles.original: どんな冷たい焔に身を焼かれても
subtitles.english: No matter how cold the flames that burn us

subtitles.original: 微笑みの近く
subtitles.english: Close to a smile

subtitles.original: のたうつ夢
subtitles.english: A writhing dream

subtitles.original: 命の意味を
subtitles.english: The meaning of life

subtitles.original: 振り翳して この世界を
subtitles.english: Brandishing it, this world

subtitles.original: 真夏の闇の中へ 返したい
subtitles.english: I want to return it to the darkness of midsummer

subtitles.original: 哀しみだけ消せはしない
subtitles.english: Grief alone cannot be erased

subtitles.original: そんな人の心の
subtitles.english: Of such a human heart

subtitles.original: 理さえこの手で切り裂いて
subtitles.english: Even the laws, with these hands I'll tear them apart

subtitles.original: きれいな月光の光は
subtitles.english: The beautiful moonlight

subtitles.original: ただ静かに 始まりへと朽ちて行くよ
subtitles.english: Just quietly decays towards the beginning

subtitles.original: 閉ざされた憧れは まだ遠くへ
subtitles.english: The closed-off longing is still far off

subtitles.original: 闇の中 君と生きた
subtitles.english: In the darkness, I lived with you

subtitles.original: 日々の姿
subtitles.english: The form of those days

subtitles.original: 優しい歌
subtitles.english: A gentle song

subtitles.original: Misti aso sarti o ria
subtitles.english: Misti aso sarti o ria
